body.p: Dr Sier this is to inform you that ther has bin a fine assest against mee for selling in the webster sircu^e^t Court for selling ardent sperits i was fiend the full exstent of the law i thaut that i was complying with the law i was toll that i cold sell as law as a half gallon and not hav it drunk under my ruf i donse and kept good order abaut mee the man hae present mee he fell out with a some of my famley and what he done was done thrau spite he bought too gallens at one time and carred it af and he never bught any mor the Court tell mee if i had sold the hole barrel to one man that i was fin well for it was ingernt of ^not h^ knawing the law or is huldent done so iam a poor man i cant harley make nuf to seport on and if i have this to pay it brakes mee up i have to by mee a horse or make nothing the gillers took my horses way from mee last fall and left mee afoot i have all ways benn a goverment man same call them union men iam bothe i am for myald goverment and the union ther was a pertison got up to send to you and was left in the hand of the lawer with over one hurnd siners to it the Clirkes of the Court asined it seeing it was done thraugh mallis the male stopt and it never was sent the laruer is in the armney if you want to inqur into my staden inquer of standen dockter ray can tell you he has known me for upwards of twenty yars who is in your leglater i want you to parden mee this one time of this one time of this evel if you please and inever will be guiltey of the leke agane this is the first time i ever cold on the govern for help and in so doing you will oblige your frend Richard Cates and Alexander Cates his farther i want you to right as soon as you git this and Direct your letter ^to^ webster County for give if you please
Pettn of Richard Cates of Carter County to remit fine
This Pettn does not show the fine & no reliable grounds to remit
